entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
